markdown:
**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 27 2.0 **Prerequisites** [Megaton Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=3059) --- When you use a full-power Megaton Strike, you can knock your foe back. When you succeed at your Strike while using an [unstable](/Traits.aspx?ID=416) Megaton Strike, your target must attempt a Fortitude save against your class DC. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is pushed back 5 feet.
**Failure** The creature is pushed back 10 feet.
**Critical Failure** The creature is pushed back 20 feet. **Special** If your innovation is a [minion](/Traits.aspx?ID=109), this benefit applies on its unstable Megaton Strikes.
name: Gigaton Strike
